original_text: And over the company of the tribe of the people of Simeon was Shelumiel the son of Zurishaddai.
korean_text: 시므온 자손 지파의 군대는 수리삿대의 아들 슬루미엘이 이끌었고

sentences.original_text: And over the company of the tribe of the people of Simeon
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 시므온 백성 지파의 단 위에는

sentences.original_text: was Shelumiel the son of Zurishaddai.
